text.section:
The Board of Trustees shall credit to each member's individual account in the annuity savings fund of the appropriate State system:
the member contributions of the member as provided in this Division II; and
regular interest on the accumulated contributions of the member as provided in this Division II.

From the annuity savings fund of the appropriate system, the Board of Trustees shall pay the accumulated contributions of a member that, as provided in this Division II:
are withdrawn by the member; or
if a member dies, are paid to the member's estate or designated beneficiary.

When a member retires or a former member commences to receive a vested allowance, the Board of Trustees shall transfer the member's or former member's accumulated contributions from the annuity savings fund of the appropriate State system to the accumulation fund of that system.
